title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message:
job from angry customer, job sat in repair queue for 4 weeks, demanded macbook back, refused to pay for return shipping, sat here for the last 6 months.
possible vomit damage, was ultrasonic before working on it due to the smell
no PM_SLP_S4_L,  PM_SLP_S5_L
ppbus_g3h, 12.53.       pp3v42_g3h, 3.482,               pp5vs5, 4.963,     pp3v3_s5,  3.302        PP3V3_S4,  0.552
no s3 rails present, because of pm_slp
PM_PCH_PWROK 0v   
after reflowing the smc i now have PM_SLP_S4_L   
now i get
all s5, plus, pp5v_s3 0.5v (no short to ground)  pp3v3_s3 0v P3V3S3_EN 0v 
checked pm_slp_s4_L again and now is 0v again

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message:
Could be anything depending on where corrosion was.

Could still be crap under SMC or PCH. Check voltage on C1802/03. Was there crap around U2600, if so replace it.

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message:
c1802 3.272
c1803 3.306 
replaced the u2600 with a u2800 from a 2936
c1802 3.581
c1803 2.6 - 3.3 up and down

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message: Now look up the difference between 2936 and 3115 clock chip!

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message: i did, the pinouts are the same, the lines coming in and out are the same, from what i can tell its the same chip

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message: if they were even a bit different i wouldnt have used it

title: 820-3115 no PM_slp_s4_L
message:
One is the A version and the other V version. Why take the risk of there being some small internal difference? \

I still suspect crap under the SMC too.
